alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Manatee, northwestern Charlotte and Sarasota Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Armands Key to 14 miles southwest of North Port. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Sarasota, Bradenton, Lakewood Ranch, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, The Meadows, Ridge Wood Heights, South Bradenton, South Sarasota, Kensington Park and Ellenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
